name: Bullet Phaze
description:
The bits have been kidnapped and it's up to you to save them! Navigate seemingly impossible levels by using your ability to phaze through bullets and other obstacles.

Controls:

-Arrows-
Left and Right Arrows to Move
Up Arrow or Z to Jump
Down Arrow or X to Phaze

-WASD-
A and D to Move
W or J to Jump
S or K to Phaze

Spacebar, Backspace, or Escape to open the pause menu.

Rescue bits in the levels to unlock new playable characters, and the extremely difficult bonus levels!
